project.title: Video Painter
project.excerpt: As a side project during the course Intro to Programming at CIID, I made a Processing sketch that enables anyone to paint with video. I later redid the program with shaders in openFrameworks
project.content:
As a side project during the course Intro to Programming at CIID, I made a Processing sketch that enables anyone to “paint with video”.

The program was written from scratch with a lot of blood, sweat and object-oriented tears.

The short video is made with help from danish director and cinematographer Torben Kjelstrup, who made his face, camera and talent available for me.

The source code is available at my Github where you will also find a faster openFrameworks version of the same project.
